metadata.title: AnividAI - Your AI Studio for Anime Worlds
metadata.description: Create original characters (OCs), generate consistent AI anime art, anime videos, stories and chat with your OCs‚Äîall in one platform with AnividAI.

fantasy_rpg.description: Character in fantasy RPG style with elaborate costume

ghiblio.description: Character inspired by Studio Ghibli with soft colors and warm atmosphere

modern_digital_painting.name: Modern Digital Painting
modern_digital_painting.description: Character in modern digital painting style with rich textures and dramatic lighting

shoujo_sparkle.name: Shoujo Sparkle
shoujo_sparkle.description: Shoujo-style character with sparkling eyes and soft romantic tones

dark_gothic.name: Dark Gothic
dark_gothic.description: Gothic character style with dramatic mood and ornate fashion details

retro_90s_anime.name: Retro 90s Anime
retro_90s_anime.description: Character in nostalgic 90s anime style with bold outlines

kawaii_anime.name: Kawaii Anime
kawaii_anime.description: Cute anime style with cozy atmosphere

z_image.name: Z-Image
z_image.description: Affordable and Fast. Reference images are not supported. Powered by Tongyi-MAI.

nano_banana.name: Nano Banana
nano_banana.description: Fast and efficient anime image generation with high quality output

nano_banana_pro.name: Nano Banana Pro
nano_banana_pro.description: Upgraded version Of Nano Banana From Google.More Power and smarter

gpt-image-1.name: GPT Image 1
gpt-image-1.description: Advanced AI model for creative and detailed anime artwork

kling_video.name: Kling 2.5 Turbo
kling_video.description: Professional anime video generation with smooth animations

kling_3_0_video.name: Kling 3.0
kling_3_0_video.description: Premium Kling 3.0 video generation with std/pro modes and high-fidelity output

sora2.name: Sora-2
sora2.description: Advanced multi-image video generation with extended duration support

sora2_pro.name: Sora-2 Pro
sora2_pro.description: Premium multi-image video generation with highest quality and advanced features

wan_2_5.name: Wan 2.5
wan_2_5.description: High-performance AI video generation supporting text and image to video conversion

seedream_4_0.name: Seedream 4.0
seedream_4_0.description: Next-Generation Image Creative Engine from ByteDance.Whether it's knowledge-driven generation, complex reasoning, or high-fidelity detail representation, it can transform your ideas into stunning visual works with faster inference speed and more precise understanding.

seedream_4_5.name: Seedream 4.5
seedream_4_5.description: Premium Image Creative Engine from ByteDance with enhanced quality. Supports 2K (basic) and 4K (high) output resolutions, and delivers exceptional detail and realism.

flux_2_pro.name: Flux 2 Pro
flux_2_pro.description: Advanced FLUX model by Black Forest Labs with strong photoreal detail, precise text rendering, and multi-reference consistency. Supports 1K and 2K output.

flux_2_flex.name: Flux 2 Flex
flux_2_flex.description: Premium FLUX model optimized for flexible multi-image control and high-fidelity generation quality. Supports 1K and 2K output.

veo_3_1_fast.name: Veo 3.1 Fast
veo_3_1_fast.description: Google DeepMind's improved AI video model now creates realistic motion, supports longer clips, uses reference image, and generates synchronized audio in native 1080p.

hailuo_2_3.name: Hailuo 2.3
hailuo_2_3.description: High-fidelity AI video generation by MiniMax, image-to-video only

hailuo_2_3_pro.name: Hailuo 2.3 Pro
hailuo_2_3_pro.description: Premium high-fidelity AI video generation by MiniMax, image-to-video only

brand.description: AnividAI is an OC-centered anime art platform, empowering you to create, manage, and explore original characters and their AI-generated worlds.

changelog.description: Track all version updates, new features, improvements, and bug fixes for AnividAI.

legal.title: Cookie Preferences
legal.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. Please choose which types of cookies you want to allow.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Required for basic site functionality. These cookies are essential for the website and its features to work properly. They cannot be disabled. Including session management, login authentication, and security protection.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our site. Used to track page views and user behavior, helping us optimize website experience.

artworkGallery.title: Select from My Artworks
artworkGallery.empty: No artworks found. Create some artworks first!

style_selector.no_presets_description: No preset templates. When you select an OC, its style is applied automatically. Otherwise, specify your desired style in the prompt or use the reference image's style.

image_generation_modal.title: Generate Image
image_generation_modal.description: Fill in the parameters and start generation.

placeholders.prompt: Describe what you want to generate

generation_status_modal.title: Generating
generation_status_modal.description: We'll update this panel as the task progresses.

video_generation_modal.title: Generate Video
video_generation_modal.description: Fill in the parameters and start generation.

placeholders.prompt: Describe what you want to generate

desk_model.name: Desk Model with ZBrush Display
desk_model.description: 1/7 Scale Realistic Model on Desk with ZBrush and BANDAI Box

toy_pack.name: Character Trait Toy Pack
toy_pack.description: Action battle pose with effects and detailed diorama base

classic_standing.name: Acrylic Base Figure
classic_standing.description: A realistic action figure stands on a round acrylic base, faithfully capturing the character's features.

cabinet_display.name: Acrylic Base Figure
cabinet_display.description: A lifelike 1/7 scale figure posed on a  acrylic base, displayed inside a realistic figure cabinet.

lego_display.name: Lego Figure Display
lego_display.description: Turn character in lego style action figure using ai.

figure_group_display.name: Figure Group Display
figure_group_display.description: Turn multi characters in action figure together using ai.

pixar_style.name: Pixar Style
pixar_style.description: Pixar-inspired sticker with 3D cartoon rendering, expressive faces, and a polished, cinematic look.

minimal_line.name: Minimal Line Art
minimal_line.description: Minimalist line art sticker with clean, simple lines and a flat 2D design.

pixel_art.name: Pixel Art
pixel_art.description: Retro pixel art sticker in 8-bit or 16-bit style.

watercolor_soft.name: Watercolor Soft
watercolor_soft.description: Soft watercolor sticker with gentle color transitions, pastel palette, and artistic hand-painted texture.

pop_art.name: Pop Art
pop_art.description: Bold pop art sticker inspired by comic books, featuring vibrant colors, halftone patterns, and strong outlines.

graffiti.name: Graffiti
graffiti.description: Urban graffiti sticker with bold spray paint effects, dynamic lines, and street art style.

chibi.name: Chibi
chibi.description: Cute chibi-style sticker featuring exaggerated, adorable characters and playful, rounded text.

no_preset.name: No Preset
no_preset.description: No preset templates. When you select an OC, its style is applied automatically. Otherwise, specify your desired style in the prompt or use the reference image's style.

feature_recommend.title: Expand Your Anime Creation Toolkit
feature_recommend.subtitle: Explore additional AI-driven features to spark inspiration and elevate your OC anime arts

ai_anime_generator.title: AI Anime Generator
ai_anime_generator.description: Generate breathtaking anime art from your OC designs or text/image prompts. Bring any character or idea to life with advanced AI.

ai_video_generator.title: AI Video Generator
ai_video_generator.description: Transform your original characters and stories into dynamic anime videos. Animate your OC universe with just a few clicks.

oc_maker.title: OC Maker
oc_maker.description: Design, customize, and manage your own original characters. Build your personal anime universe from scratch.

chat.title: Chat with OCs
chat.description: Interact and role-play with your created characters. Experience immersive conversations powered by AI.

ai_action_figure_generator.title: AI Action Figure Generator
ai_action_figure_generator.description: Convert your OC into unique, collectible action figures. Visualize your characters in 3D and share them with the community.

ai_sticker_generator.title: AI Sticker Generator
ai_sticker_generator.description: Create adorable anime stickers featuring your OCs. Express yourself and share your characters in chats and social media.

fantasy.name: Fantasy (General)
fantasy.description: General worlds of magic, mythic creatures, and ancient legends.

western_fantasy.name: Western Fantasy
western_fantasy.description: Classic medieval settings with knights, high magic, and epic lore.

japanese_fantasy.name: Japanese Fantasy (Isekai/JRPG)
japanese_fantasy.description: Anime-style fantasy often featuring adventurer guilds and distinct magic circles.

cyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.description: High-tech, low-life future with neon lights and heavy rain.

slice_of_life.name: Slice of Life
slice_of_life.description: Everyday stories in realistic or slightly idealized settings.

sci_fi.name: Sci-Fi
sci_fi.description: Interstellar travel, advanced technology, and alien civilizations.

horror_gothic.name: Horror / Gothic
horror_gothic.description: Dark, eerie settings with supernatural or psychological thrills.

post_apocalyptic.name: Post-Apocalyptic
post_apocalyptic.description: Survival in a world after a global catastrophe.

eastern_fantasy.name: Eastern Fantasy (Xianxia/Wuxia)
eastern_fantasy.description: Traditional East Asian mythology and martial arts.
